src:
Novo priznanje: Mitrović ubedljivo najbolji
06 Nov 2019, 13:06 by Darko
Reprezentativac Srbije Aleksandar Mitrović proglašen je za najboljeg igrača Čempionšipa u oktobru.
Golgeter „orlova“ i Fulama je u proteklom mesecu postigao šest golova na pet mečeva za svoj tim, uključujući i prvi het trik u pobedi nad Lutonom od 3:2.
Rezultati glasanja za igrača meseca pokazali su da Mitrović nije imao pravu konkurenciju. Srbin je dobio 46 procenata glasova, ispred golmana Lidsa Kika Kasilje (18%) i Toma Barkhoizena iz Prestona (12%).

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
New recognition: Mitrovic by far the best
06 Nov 2019, 12:06 by Darko
Serbian national team player Aleksandar Mitrovic was named the best player of the Championship in October.
The Eagles and Fulham goalkeeper scored six goals in five matches for his team last month, including his first hat trick in Luton's 3-2 win.
Voting results for Player of the Month showed that Mitrovic had no real competition. The Serb received 46 percent of the vote, ahead of Leeds goalie Kik Kasilja (18%) and Tom Barkhoizen of Preston (12%).
